ServiceSetupProvisioning.name: ServiceSetupProvisioning
ServiceSetupProvisioning.description: Represents a task completed by the Service Setup Assistant.

JobName.description: The name of a group of tasks completed by the Service Setup Assistant.

Status.description: The status of the task being completed by the Service Setup Assistant.

TaskAction.description: The action taken by the task.

TaskActionContext.description: Additional details about the TaskAction parameter, including how much of the action has been processed.

TaskContext.description: The description of the changes included in the task.
